info.name: Dark hooktube
info.description: The purpose of this style is to make hooktube.com look exactly the same as youtube.com with dark theme applied.
info.additionalInfo:
https://github.com/8084/dark-hooktube

Fork of https://userstyles.org/styles/147878/hooktube-dark-theme

Improvements over the original code:

- converted hotlinked image to base64
- fixed menu button appearance
- removed unused code
